citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_476204a7-0714-4755-953d-61fa3c5df497\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Hayley\", \"family\": \"Dosser\"}, {\"given\": \"Jennifer\", \"family\": \"Jackson\"}, {\"given\": \"Wiley\", \"family\": \"Evans\"}, {\"given\": \"Chris\", \"family\": \"Mackenzie\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}, {\"given\": \"Stephanie\", \"family\": \"Waterman\"}, {\"given\": \"Charles\", \"family\": \"Hannah\"}, {\"literal\": \"Tula Foundation\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"11\", \"13\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce r\u00e9f\u00e9rentiel contient l'ensemble de donn\u00e9es sur les nutriments de l'Institut Hakai pour les mesures de la concentration de nitrate+nitrite, de silicate et de phosphate utilis\u00e9 dans la publication\u00a0: Dosser, H. V., Waterman, S., Jackson, J. M., Hannah, C. G., Evans, W., & Hunt, B. P. V. (2021). Stark physical and biogeochemical differences and implications for ecosystem stressors in the Northeast Pacific coastal ocean. Journal of Geophysical Research\u00a0: Oceans, 126, E2020JC017033. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020JC017033. Profils nutritifs dissous pour les nitrates + nitrites, phosphates et silicates collect\u00e9s dans les stations oc\u00e9anographiques de Hakai sur la c\u00f4te de la Colombie-Britannique de 2013 \u00e0 2018. Des \u00e9chantillons ont \u00e9t\u00e9 pr\u00e9lev\u00e9s par le Hakai Oceanography Program sur de petits bateaux \u00e0 l'aide de bouteilles Niskin suivant les protocoles d'\u00e9chantillonnage GO_SHIP\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Nutriments de l'Institut Hakai (Dosser et al., 2021)\", \"version\": \"1\", \"DOI\": \"10.21966/j3j5-wt70\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_476204a7-0714-4755-953d-61fa3c5df497?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_476204a7-0714-4755-953d-61fa3c5df497\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Hayley\", \"family\": \"Dosser\"}, {\"given\": \"Jennifer\", \"family\": \"Jackson\"}, {\"given\": \"Wiley\", \"family\": \"Evans\"}, {\"given\": \"Chris\", \"family\": \"Mackenzie\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}, {\"given\": \"Stephanie\", \"family\": \"Waterman\"}, {\"given\": \"Charles\", \"family\": \"Hannah\"}, {\"literal\": \"Tula Foundation\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"11\", \"13\"]}], \"abstract\": \"This repository contains the Hakai Institute nutrient dataset for measurements of nitrate+nitrite, silicate, and phosphate concentration used in the publication: Dosser, H. V., Waterman, S., Jackson, J. M., Hannah, C. G., Evans, W., & Hunt, B. P. V. (2021). Stark physical and biogeochemical differences and implications for ecosystem stressors in the Northeast Pacific coastal ocean. Journal of Geophysical Research: Oceans, 126, e2020JC017033. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020JC017033. Dissolved nutrient profiles for Nitrate + Nitrite, Phosphate and Silicate collected at Hakai Oceanography stations on the BC coast from 2013 to 2018. Samples were collected by the Hakai Oceanography Program from small boats using Niskin bottles following GO_SHIP sampling protocols\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Hakai Institute Nutrients (Dosser et al., 2021)\", \"version\": \"1\", \"DOI\": \"10.21966/j3j5-wt70\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_476204a7-0714-4755-953d-61fa3c5df497?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>This repository contains the Hakai Institute nutrient dataset for measurements of nitrate+nitrite, silicate, and phosphate concentration used in the publication: Dosser, H. V., Waterman, S., Jackson, J. M., Hannah, C. G., Evans, W., & Hunt, B. P. V. (2021). Stark physical and biogeochemical differences and implications for ecosystem stressors in the Northeast Pacific coastal ocean. Journal of Geophysical Research: Oceans, 126, e2020JC017033. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020JC017033. Dissolved nutrient profiles for Nitrate + Nitrite, Phosphate and Silicate collected at Hakai Oceanography stations on the BC coast from 2013 to 2018. Samples were collected by the Hakai Oceanography Program from small boats using Niskin bottles following GO_SHIP sampling protocols</gco:CharacterString>

name: ca-cioos_476204a7-0714-4755-953d-61fa3c5df4971
notes: This repository contains the Hakai Institute nutrient dataset for measurements of nitrate+nitrite, silicate, and phosphate concentration used in the publication: Dosser, H. V., Waterman, S., Jackson, J. M., Hannah, C. G., Evans, W., & Hunt, B. P. V. (2021). Stark physical and biogeochemical differences and implications for ecosystem stressors in the Northeast Pacific coastal ocean. Journal of Geophysical Research: Oceans, 126, e2020JC017033. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020JC017033. Dissolved nutrient profiles for Nitrate + Nitrite, Phosphate and Silicate collected at Hakai Oceanography stations on the BC coast from 2013 to 2018. Samples were collected by the Hakai Oceanography Program from small boats using Niskin bottles following GO_SHIP sampling protocols
